slots.name: popper
slots.description: The component used for the popper.

slots.name: transition
slots.description:
The component used for the transition.
[Follow this guide](https://mui.com/material-ui/transitions/#transitioncomponent-prop) to learn more about the requirements for this component.

slots.name: tooltip
slots.description: The component used for the tooltip.

slots.name: arrow
slots.description: The component used for the arrow.

classes.description: Styles applied to the Popper component if `arrow={true}`.
Styles applied to the Popper component unless the tooltip is open.
Styles applied to the Popper component unless `disableInteractive={true}`.
Styles applied to the tooltip (label wrapper) element if `arrow={true}`.
Styles applied to the tooltip (label wrapper) element if `placement` contains "bottom".
Styles applied to the tooltip (label wrapper) element if `placement` contains "left".
Styles applied to the tooltip (label wrapper) element if `placement` contains "right".
Styles applied to the tooltip (label wrapper) element if `placement` contains "top".
Styles applied to the tooltip (label wrapper) element if the tooltip is opened by touch.
